page.title: 12NEW HOUSING
page.content: {THE GRANGE FARM ESTATE}IS VERY CRAMPED THE BRICKS FOR THE HOUSES ARE A SANDY COLOUR OR RED.{THE CROUDACE ESTATE}IS VERY BIG IT HAS ABOUT ELEVEN ROADS RUNNING THROUGH IT.SOME OF THE HOUSES ARE LESS THAN A YEAR OLD AND SOME ARE OVER FIVE YEARS OLD.THERE IS NOT MUCH PLAYING AREA BUT THERE IS A WOOD.MOST HOUSES HAVE TWO TO FOUR BEDROOMS IN A HOUSE.MOST HOUSES HAVE GARAGES.THE {BARNS GREEN HARVEST RETIREMENT HOMES} ARE IN THE PLACE OF AN OLD BARN,A COW_ SHED AND SOME IMPLEMENT SHEDS.NOW THE 16 HOUSES HAVE THE SAME STRUCTURE AS THE ORIGINAL BARN AND SHEDS.THE HOUSES ARE Â£35000_Â£40000.THERE ARE 15 HOUSES OR BUNGALOWS WHICH CAN ONLY BE BOUGHT BY OLD PEOPLE.THERE IS ALSO A WARDENS HOUSE.IT TOOK ONE YEAR TO BUILD THE HOUSES AFTER CLEARING THE SITE.THE OLD PEOPLE CARRY A TRANSMITTER TO CALL THE WARDEN IF THEY NEED HELP.
